verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paramunu vidichi ehamuna karigenu Paapula korakai rakhtamu kaarchenu Punaruddhanudai rakshana nitche poornamugaa Muginche{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dukhamu nundi mamu vidipinchenu Shokamu rogamu lanniyu baapenu Aadarinchenu naadu hrudaya vedanalalo Adbutamun jariginche{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Loka paapamulanu mosenu prabhuvu Lokamu korakai gaayamu londenu Adharma kaaryamulakai naligenu Prabhuvu arpinchu konenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Priyulaaraa randi kalisi paadedamu Priyudagu prabhuvun aaraadinchedamu Charanamulapai badi ghana parachedamu Cheri bhaya bhakhtitho{/lang-eng}
